description: Variation of Conditions 1, 21 and 22, and removal of Conditions 23 and 24 of planning permission dated 21 November 2024 (Ref: 24/04081/FULL) (as amended by Ref: 25/01159/NMA) for, 'Change of use of part-basement, part-ground floor and part-first floor to provide a food hall premises (Sui Generis). Alterations and extensions at roof level, including the creation of a roof terrace, green roof, and replacement of plant; replacement of windows throughout the building, alterations to the ground floor facades, creation of a new terrace at second floor level on Air Street and creation of new cycle facilities'; NAMELY, amendments to the floor plans to increase the size of the food hall into previously demised retail and office accommodation, alterations to shopfronts and doors at ground floor and alterations to plant and the roof enclosure at roof level; variation to conditions relating to the capacity and opening hours of the individual food courts and removal of redundant conditions. (Application under Section 73 of the Act).
